Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights midmarch pleasantly surprised wonderful hotel proved booked premium worth money nice bathroom shower amenities hotels buffet breakfast extensive staffed offered brownies complaint beds little hard spain convenient walk sights madrid metro numerous tappas bars neighborhood quiet light sleepers return madrid stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Clean, Modern and Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Kirby003
Reviews.Content: wife arrived airport bus puerta de atocha train station 30 minute ride 2 euros person metro stops hotel anton martin decided walk luggage 10 minute walk note calle de atocha slightly uphill concierge staff helpful multilingual able check enter earlier designated checkin times 5th floor towards hotel spacious hotel weve stayed modern amenities clean hardwood floors free wifi location hotel close retiro park prado museum plaza mayor mercato de san miguel etc 15 minute walk banks steps hotel atm transactions coffee fresh orange juice churros chocolate morning opted hotel buffet breakfast wife inadvertently left sunglasses checked 3 day trip sevilla called hotel staff helpful able retrieve issues returned madrid

Reviews.Content: stayed nights fault hotel staff lovely modern hotel easy walking distance sights breakfast free wifi keen equiped gym downstairs hotel busy main requested loads bars nearby cross road left left total favs bars jazz cocktails

Reviews.Content: location walking distance museums prado thyssen caixa forum nice restaurants nearby santa ana steps public transport anton martin brand 1 week hotel nice bathing amenities beds friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Great location, excellent modern hotel”
Reviews.Author: Chris M
Reviews.Content: booked hotel weekend base sightsee madrid impressed modern clean comfortable staff friendly spoke excellent english hotel ideally placed madrid short walk plaza mayor wonderful mercato de san miguel market short walk prado botanical gardens close calle de las huertas little bars alive 2200 hotel offers free wifi useful wouldnt bother breakfast extra little cafe literally opposite hotel lovely breakfast worth shopping book deals prices hotel online overall strongly recommend hotel returning soon

Reviews.Title: “New hotel, great rooms, great location”
Reviews.Author: EricGu
Reviews.Content: stayed friends hotel catalonia plaza mayor 2 nights road trip south spain 4 booked 2 chance upgraded spatious nicely decorated sound isolation basically hear street 1st 2nd floor street shower nice hotel months according hotel staff free wifi ipad laptop unfortunately smartphone mechanism special offer breakfast 10 euros deal location hotel walking distance main attractions overall happy hotel stay especially price paid recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT”
Reviews.Author: lavellejohn
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night break hotel 18 stayed 3 nights 89 booked stay ranging night hotel location modern clean staff reception housekeeping extremely helpful friendly little issue bathroom doors frosted glass except hotel logo gaps bathroom door frame lying bed sitting toilet hilarious people finding disturbing

Reviews.Title: “Great location, comfortable room, helpful staff, fair price”

Reviews.Content: stayed catalonia port barcelona 2 ago fabulous experience chose chain hotel stayed madrid love chain hotel hotels central city spacious modern hotels rate plus price affordable 4 star hotel eur 80 night double occupancy breakfast coffee shops hotel actually front hotel arrived reception business center friend forgot print boarding pass sent email print free friend computer directly printed boarding pass wifi connection advantage hotel highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location – almost ticked all the boxes!”

Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location madrid sightseeing close restaurants tapas bars plaza de santa ana complete renovation 6 months ago interior fresh modern appearance wasn’t overly set bed extremely comfortable shower powerful overlooked inner courtyard quiet dark lit series little spot lights impossible apply makeup sort dressing table tv positioned mirror alongside bed enable style hair unplug valued bedside lights plug straighteners sit floor style apart recommend hotel staff spoke extremely friendly helpful arrival receptionist map highlighted arrived 10 pm recommend eat tapas barrestaurant perfect night –in returned night didn’t breakfast hotel expensive didn’t fantastic road offered breakfast deal coffee juice pastry choices endless hungry thinking plus hotel offer late checkout 3pm €30 6pm €40 – return flight advantage

Reviews.Content: hotel catalonia plaza mayor newly refurbished stylish comfortable hotel located relative atocha renfe closer nearest metro station plenty eat corner plaza mayor liked hotel pleasant nature front office staff interacted frequently xavier rosa 5day stay found fluent english cheerfully helpful bellboys active available five hotels trip modern decor pleasing design bathroom door fitting sealing edges please bedroom bathroom fittings uniformly standard facilities tea coffee pleasant hotel recommend highly

Reviews.Content: stayed friend 3 nights late september pleasantly surprised pleased location near plaza mayor santa ana puerta del sol 10 minutes walking distance time money wasted museums restaurants bars shopping easily accessible hotel metro block cafes nearby including fantastic pastry shop directly hotel spotless spacious bright clean nice modern touch bathrooms smokers nonsmoking available wouldnt walking hotel fairly staff super nice accommodating helpful regularly inquired directions restaurants sites etc wifi business center computer access hotel direct internet cafe 2 blocks highly recommend definitely stay
